item.title: BrainPop
item.description: Take aways Brilliant videos whch are actually interactive and break down the subject matter in a very easy to understand manner. They use thew cartoon character and a video script to explain anything. Its a clever use of a framework that can be extended by student to make their own videos.

item.title: Newsela
item.description: Take Aways Reading comprehension quizzes and writing prompts and annotation features Healthy library of some of the best reading materials for children. Lot of private schools have enrolled in their program They cover current topics like “Native American Heritage” Month. New articles that kids can relate to and easy to read Same articles made age and grade appropriate for the audience

item.title: Think Like Churchill
item.description: Think Like Churchill portrays how hurchill made is decisions by putting children in his shoes and guess how Churchill made decision in various circumstances. Kids learn nuances of Churchill’s decision making and also learn civil and historical issues at the same time.
